TextView.android:text: Rating Bar:\n A RatingBar is an extension of SeekBar and ProgressBar that shows a rating in stars. The user can touch/drag or use arrow keys to set the rating when using the default size RatingBar. The smaller RatingBar style ( R.attr.ratingBarStyleSmall) and the larger indicator-only style (R.attr.ratingBarStyleIndicator) do not support user interaction and should only be used as indicators
